name: A Devil's Love Prologue
description:
This is the prologue to A Devil's Love. We will be working on getting the voices in as well as music. We have a patreon going on as well as a kickstarter.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/kibougames

Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1356137414/a-devils-love
